## Join
inner joins (intersection)   
Outer joins:left join, right join, full join (union)  

## Key Functions
For tidying table:  
`pivot_longer`  
`pivot_wider`  
`separate`  
For combining multiple tables:  
`bind_rows`    
`*_join`
